page.title: 02POPULATION SURVEY.
page.content: We did a{demographic survey} of Langar and Barnstone.Here are the results: Under 5,27;5-11,48;11-18,30;18-40,168;40-60, 105;60+,54. Today there are more older people and less younger people than in the first survey in 1851.In the first survey there were 115 people at this school but now there are only 72 people. Only 45% returned our survey altogether,we had 432 out of 922. We also did a survey of where people worked.Our results are as follows: <3 miles 3-8 8-20 >20 miles abroad 22% 15% 39% 18% 5% 360 people were born in Nottingham, 72 people were born around Great- Britain.
